component.name: getVaccineCoverageByUSAState
component.description: Get COVID-19 vaccine doses administered for a state that has reported vaccination rollout. Sourced from https://covid.ourworldindata.org/

component.name: getTimeSeriesByUSAStateNYT
component.description: Get COVID-19 time series data for a state or set of states, with an entry for each day since the pandemic began

component.name: getTimeSeriesByUSACountyNYT
component.description: Get COVID-19 time series data for a county or set of counties, with an entry for each day since the pandemic began

component.name: getUSCountiesStatus
component.description: Get COVID-19 totals for all US counties

component.name: getTimeSeriesOfMultipleCountries
component.description: Get COVID-19 time series data for a specific set of countries

component.name: getAppleMobilityDataSupportedCountries
component.description: Get a list of supported countries for Apple mobility data

component.name: getVaccineCoverageByCountry
component.description: Get COVID-19 vaccine doses administered for a country that has reported vaccination rollout. Sourced from https://covid.ourworldindata.org/

component.name: getTimeSeriesForUSACounties
component.description: Get all possible US States to query the /historical/usacounties/{state} endpoint with

component.name: getVaccineCoverageOfAllCountries
component.description: Get COVID-19 vaccine doses administered for all countries that have reported rolling out vaccination. Sourced from https://covid.ourworldindata.org/

component.name: getGlobalStatusInTimeSeries
component.description: Get global accumulated COVID-19 time series data

component.name: getAppleMobilityDataSupportedSubRegions
component.description: Get a list of supported subregions for specific country in the Apple mobility data set

component.name: getAllCountriesAndProvincesStatus
component.description: Get COVID-19 totals for all countries and their provinces

component.name: getGovenrmentDataSupportedCountries
component.description: Get a list of supported countries for government specific data

component.name: getInfluenzaReportsByUSPHL
component.description: Get Influenza report data for the 2019 and 2020 outbreaks from the US Center for Disease Control, reported by US public health labs

component.name: getInfluenzaReportsByUCLA
component.description: Get Influenza report data for the 2019 and 2020 outbreaks from the US Center for Disease Control, reported by US clinical labs

component.name: getTimeSeriesDataForMultipleProvinces
component.description: Get COVID-19 time series data for a set of provinces in a country

component.name: getTotalGlobalVaccineDosesAdministered
component.description: Get total global COVID-19 vaccine doses administered. Sourced from https://covid.ourworldindata.org/

component.name: getUSAStatusByCounty
component.description: Get COVID-19 totals for a specific county

component.name: getVaccineTrialData
component.description: Get vaccine trial data from RAPS (Regulatory Affairs Professional Society). Specifically published by Jeff Craven at https://www.raps.org/news-and-articles/news-articles/2020/3/covid-19-vaccine-tracker

component.name: getStatusBySubRegionUsingAppleMobilotyData
component.description: Get COVID-19 Apple mobility data for subregions of a country

component.name: getTimeSeriesForAllCountriesAndProvinces
component.description: Get COVID-19 time series data for all countries and their provinces

component.name: getVaccineCoverageOfAllUSAStates
component.description: Get COVID-19 vaccine doses administered for all states that have reported rolling out vaccination. Sourced from https://covid.ourworldindata.org/

component.name: getTimeSeriesForUSANYT
component.description: Get COVID-19 time series data for the entire USA, with an entry for each day since the pandemic began

component.name: getTimeSeriesBycountry
component.description: Get COVID-19 time series data for a specific country

component.name: getTherapeuticsTrialData
component.description: Get therapeutics trial data from RAPS (Regulatory Affairs Professional Society). Specifically published by Jeff Craven at https://www.raps.org/news-and-articles/news-articles/2020/3/covid-19-therapeutics-tracker

component.name: getUSACountiesDataByState
component.description: Get COVID-19 time series data for all counties in a specified US state

component.name: getInfluenzaLikeIllnessData
component.description: Get Influenza-like-illness data for the 2019 and 2020 outbreaks from the US Center for Disease Control

component.name: getTimeSeriesByProvince
component.description: Get COVID-19 time series data for a specific province in a country

component.name: getTimeSeriesForAllUSAStatesNYT
component.description: Get COVID-19 time series data for all states, with an entry for each day since the pandemic began
